import React, {Component} from "react" import SelectFilter from './select' import toggleDecorator from '../decorators/toggleDecorator' import logo from '../logo.svg' import searchSign from '../search-sign.svg' class Header extends Component{ state={ opacity: 1, transformL: 'rotate(0deg)', transformR: 'rotate(0deg)' } toggleSearchBtn=()=>{ this.setState({ opacity: this.state.opacity === 0 ? 1 : 0, transformL: this.state.transformL === 'rotate(0deg)' ? 'rotate(45deg)': 'rotate(0deg)', transformR: this.state.transformR === 'rotate(0deg)' ? 'rotate(-45deg)': 'rotate(0deg)' }) } render(){ const searchSign_btn = return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{ searchSign_btn }
{this.SearchComp}
) } get SearchComp(){ if (!this.props.isOpen) return null return (
) } } export default toggleDecorator(Header)
